Name: Space Codex
About the game: Space Codex is a casual retro arcade minimal awesome top-down shooter featuring waves of enemy spaceships with different attacks in what is, literally, a bullet hell. To beat them, you will have power-up options available through the map. The game only gets harder. How long can you stay alive? Features: - Multiple and unique power-ups - Beautiful retro, pixelated graphics - Unique chiptune soundtrack - Multiple enemies with different behaviors Music by: Visager sawsquarenoise TeknoAXE
